meanings.sent1: The old, rundown house was uninsurable due to its poor condition.
meanings.sent2: The high-risk driver was deemed uninsurable by all insurance companies.
meanings.sent3: Trying to insure that ancient, creaky ship would be like trying to insure a ghost!
meanings.sent4: Her heart, filled with unpredictable emotions, felt as uninsurable as a stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The fragile, delicate glass figurine was as uninsurable as a soap bubble.

meanings.sent1: After the flood, the homeowner found herself in an uninsurable situation.
meanings.sent2: The rare stamp collection was considered uninsurable by most insurance providers.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to insure a rocket-powered skateboard was met with an uninsurable response.
meanings.sent4: The idea of insuring a flying car seemed as uninsurable as capturing a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The valuable painting, with its mysterious past, was as uninsurable as a secret treasure.
